en_des: Kanon Sabz was one of my first projects in the field of website design. Using WordPress and respecting all the customer's needs, this site was designed and customized for psychology discussion. I used the colors that were related to the customer's business and optimized it for selling psychology courses by using the best store format. Using CSS and creativity in the use of elements, I completely personalized the site, so that none of the elements are similar to the original format. I am proud to share that this project was one of the biggest breakthroughs in the world of web design for me.

en_des: In this first version of the site, HTML, CSS and JavaScript have been used to design this page. Our goal in designing this site was to create a creative, attractive and minimal experience for the user. In this first version, we have been inspired by different sites and designs to bring the best to the user. Our goal in this site is to introduce our services and capabilities as a web designer. We have used the best technologies and design methods to provide the user with a unique experience.

en_des: Introducing my latest project: a chat room using Next.js with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Styled Components and Redux (without using Socket.io) ğŸš€ This project shows that I am able to design and develop a user-friendly chat room and I'm fast using Next.js, a powerful React framework. Taking advantage of TypeScript, I made the project code stable and expandable in terms of security and maintainability. Using Tailwind CSS allows me to easily create amazing and responsive UI components. Using Styled Components, I had fine control over the appearance of the app and made the chat room beautiful with a personalized touch. Using Redux, I implemented a centralized state management solution that enables seamless sorting of messages by time. In addition, this chat room provides real-time information about the presence of users and displays who is online and who is offline. Proud of the simplicity and beauty of this project that demonstrates my mastery of Next.js and showcases my design abilities.

en_des: Hello to all dear friends! Today I want to talk to you about a new and exciting project that I recently designed. This project is a shop site for technical tools, fully customized with all my efforts. My main goal in designing this site has been to create an excellent and optimal user experience for users. In this project, I left all ready-made templates and completely designed and implemented the site from scratch. Using CSS codes, I customized the appearance and layout of the site precisely and as desired. All the colors, fonts and details of the site's appearance were designed with care and continuous improvement so that users can experience a sense of surprise and pleasure in using the site. Also, in order to create a perfect user experience on mobile phones, I specially designed the site for mobile. By using responsive techniques, the site is displayed correctly on any screen size and device, and users can easily reach their goals without any restrictions. My site has a very extensive collection of technical tools. In order to improve the loading speed, I chose a host with high performance and super speed. This allows users to quickly find and buy the products they want. Also, the photos of the site were designed by Alireza. He has followed all the principles of design and efficiency and with their quality and size, he has brought the speed of the site. I sincerely thank Alireza (instagram.com/1alireza_ali) for his sincere cooperation and creative ideas. He also played a major role in the design of many pages of the project
